section.heading: Live pathogenic microorganisms or viruses; sale or other disposal; labeling containers

content.p:
ยง 3202. Live pathogenic microorganisms or viruses; sale or other
disposal; labeling containers. 1. All live pathogenic microorganisms or
viruses other than vaccine virus when given away or sold shall bear a
label on the container showing the contents of the container.
 2. If the distributor is required to be registered, the label shall
also bear the registration number assigned by the department, or in the
city of New York by the department of health of such city, for the
handling of pathogenic microorganisms or viruses, the name of the person
obtaining the material, and the destination of the pathogenic
microorganisms or viruses.
